Name: My student loves me!
About the game: Story You are a part-time tutor and your student confesses to you that he loves you. When you agree, she begs you to kiss her... Character Yuka Tachibana {STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Chara.png Your student. Loves you! She has an honest and energetic personality. You A college student who works part-time as a private tutor. Feature ・Your choices will change the story and what you play! In some cases, you may end up not having feelings for each other... ・VR mode is on board! VR allows for a more immersive experience. ・You can move the camera freely! In desktop mode, you can view the character from any angle you like! ・Changeable appearance! You can change the character to the color of your choice! Please choose your favorite appearance. You can also change your own skin color. ・There are six kinds of play! There are kissing (plus ear licking), fellatio, back, sitting facing each other, normal position, and cowgirl position. ・Fine expressions ・Manual mode is available! (VR mode only) The girl moves according to your controller movements!
